r.s: Object-oriented PHP HTTP Client for PHP 5.3+
r.d: Guzzle is a PHP HTTP client library and framework for building RESTful web service clients
r.n: * Bug: Query string values set to 0 are no longer dropped from the query string * Bug: A Collection object is no longer created each time a call is made to ``Guzzle\Service\Command\AbstractCommand::getRequestHeaders()`` * Bug: ``+`` is now treated as an encoded space when parsing query strings * QueryString and Collection performance improvements * Allowing dot notation for class paths in filters attribute of a service descriptions
